name: After School Programs
description: Grades K – 2 The Claire Lilienthal After School Program (CLASP) is a non-profit program open to students in kindergarten through second grade. There is a fee for the program. CLASP operates at the Madison Campus; participating children go directly to CLASP at the end of the school day. The program offers recreation, homework help, crafts, and story and quiet time. For more information, please email claspprogram@gmail.com or call (415) 750-1577. Grades 3 – 8 The Claire Lilienthal Learning Academy
